name: OR_LOG_DEF_FS
description: The OR_LOG_DEF_FS table contains the default Flowsheets used in the log.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the defaulted flowsheet templates used for this log.

columns.name: DEFAULT_FLOWSHEETS
columns.description: The default flowsheet templates used for this log.

columns.name: DEFAULT_FLOWSHEETS_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.
